00041 namespace RTT
00042 {
00043     Marshalling::Marshalling(TaskContext* owner)
00044       : ServiceRequester("marshalling",owner),
00045         loadProperties("loadProperties"),
00046         storeProperties("storeProperties"),
00047         readProperties("readProperties"),
00048         updateProperties("updateProperties"),
00049         readProperty("readProperty"),
00050         writeProperties("writeProperties"),
00051         updateFile("updateFile"),
00052         writeProperty("writeProperty")
00053     {
00054         addOperationCaller(loadProperties);
00055         addOperationCaller(storeProperties);
00056         addOperationCaller(readProperties);
00057         addOperationCaller(updateProperties);
00058         addOperationCaller(readProperty);
00059         addOperationCaller(writeProperties);
00060         addOperationCaller(updateFile);
00061         addOperationCaller(writeProperty);
00062     }
00063
